bibl.title: Grave Stelae from Deir el-Naqlun.
bibl.note: Polish excavations at Naqlun. - The typology of the stelae. - 5 epitaphs (5th - 7th cent.), 1 fragment of a stela, and 3 fragments of gravestones. - Pp. 52-54. Epitaph of Christodoros (new edition of S.E.G. XLV, 2085).
bibl.seg: GODLEWSKI Wlodzimierz and Adam LAJTAR, Grave Stelae from Deir el-Naqlun.

Polish excavations at Naqlun. - The typology of the stelae. - 5 epitaphs (5th - 7th cent.), 1 fragment of a stela, and 3 fragments of gravestones. - Pp. 52-54. Epitaph of Christodoros (new edition of S.E.G. XLV, 2085).
